column2: "Waha, wahahaha! Really? Truly?! Thank you so much! Woohoo! With this, the Random Drink EX...!"
"With the ingredients you brought back, I'll whip up a batch right before your very eyes!"
"First some of this, then some of that, and... Here it is! The ultimate drink!"
"Next time I see you, I'll have it on offer. I hope it becomes one of your favorites!"
"I don't know how I'll ever thank you enough. You really came through this time!"
